component.name: List View
component.description: A versatile list view component for displaying structured data in scrollable list format. Features item selection, filtering, sorting capabilities, and customizable item templates for flexible data presentation and user interaction.

variants.name: Minimalism
variants.description: A functional list view implementation featuring clear item separation, efficient scrolling, responsive interaction feedback, and smooth animations. Provides effective data visualization and navigation for browsing list content efficiently with intuitive controls.

variants.name: Material Design
variants.description: List View implementation in Material Design style

variants.name: Bootstrap 5
variants.description: List View implementation in Bootstrap 5 style

variants.name: Neumorphism
variants.description: List View implementation in Neumorphism style

variants.name: Glassmorphism
variants.description: List View implementation in Glassmorphism style
